name: 楊哲化
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 基礎物理光學 2. 超音波簡介 3. 雷射超音波的生成 4. 雷射超音波的偵測 5. 刀邊緣技術 6. 雙頻干涉儀 7. 費里裴洛干涉儀 8. 非線性晶體干涉儀 9. 雷射超音波技術於非破壞檢測之應用 10. 雷射超音波技術於材料性質量測之應用 11. 雷射超音波技術發展的未來趨勢
1.Introduction to physical optics, 2.Introduction to ultrasonic waves, 3.Optical generation of ultrasound waves, 4.Detection of ultrasonic waves with optical methods, 5.Knife edge technique, 6.Hetrodyne interferometers in LUT, 7.Fabry-Perot interferometers, 8.Two-way mixing interferometers, 9.Application of LUT in nondestructive testing, 10.Application of LUT to material characterizations, 11.Future trend of LUT.
schedule:
1	2/17	Course introduction
2	2/24	Introduction to laser ultrasonics
3	3/3	Principle of ultrasonics
4	3/10	Lasers
5	3/17	Physical optics
6	3/24	Generation of ultrasound with optical methods (1)
7	3/31	Generation of ultrasound with optical methods (2)
8	4/7	First presentation
9	4/14	Measurement of ultrasound signals
10	4/21	Knife edge technique
11	4/28	Lab on laser ultrasonics
12	5/5	Michaelson interferometers
13	5/12	Second presentation
14	5/19	Hetrodyne interferometers
15	5/26	Fabry-Perot Interferometers
16	6/2	LUT in industrial applications
17	6/9	Final Project presentation
18	6/16	Final Exam
materials: C.B Scruby and L.E Drain, Laser Ultrasonics Techniques and Applications, CRC Press.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
